alert.note: Alert for Greene; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 4:57PM EDT until March 27 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Little Miami River at Spring Valley. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Miami River at Spring Valley. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding impacts short areas of Middletown and Waynesville Roads, in addition to Corwin Road and Corwin Park. Backwater flooding may impact Route 725 in Sugarcreek township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM EDT Sunday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue falling this evening and fall below flood stage overnight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
